mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over(order by ID) idx,e.* from dept e) s where ID between #{before} and #{after}
mapper.update: update dept set id=#{id},dept_code=#{dept_code}, dept_name=#{dept_name}, dept_catagory=#{dept_catagory}, dept_type=#{dept_type} where id = #{oid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from dept where ${dom} like '%' #{value} '%'
select * from (select row_number() over(order by ID) idx,e.* from dept e) s where ID between #{before} and #{after} and ${dom} like '%' #{value} '%'
